title: Mexico : age distribution of internet users 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, with a total of 7 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely negative which exists from 6-11_years to 25-34_years.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 25-34_years to Over_55_years.
gold: This statistic gives information on the age distribution of internet users in Mexico as of April 2019 . During this period of time , it was found that 22 percent of internet users in the Latin American country were aged between 25 and 34 years .
